headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'nonce-{script value}' 'strict-dynamic' https: 'unsafe-eval' blob: https://www.googletagmanager.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com *.google.com https://*.gstatic.com data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'nonce-{style value}' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com *.google.com *.googleusercontent.com https://res.cloudinary.com data:; frame-src 'self' *.google.com; worker-src blob:;
